channel.title: eBay Calling me?
channel.description: Well I bought a pretty cool looking rasta herb grinder off eBay a couple of minutes ago and they asked for my phone number on PayPal and all that jazz. Just wondering, would it be possible that they may call my house to confirm the purchase of the item since there's an age limit to buy one of these items? Also please note my account says I'm over the age of 18 (even though I'm not) I'd rather not explain to my parents why I'm buying one if they did happen to call. Thanks in advance, and please don't concern yourself with my life and the things I buy..

item.title: eBay Calling me?
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

@acorn, there are specific brands but its better just to go to go to a shop and check them out. Feels the blades(durability, sharpness), how it works, smoothness when you turn it(obviously it wont be as smooth when you grind), how it can possibly detioriate cause quite a lot of badly made grinders don’t last long.
Electric herb grinders are the best though, there not generally meant for weed cause they cost like £20-£30 but it pretty much dices it up so you can sprinkle it in ^_^.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Acorn1 Acorn_
item.description:
@Acorn1 wrote:

Uncalled:

Good grinders are the best thing in the world - I own two.

Are there any specific brands of grinders I should be on the look out for?
I plan on getting a few of em later on in the year.

item.title: eBay Calling me?
item.dc:creator: @Acorn1 Acorn_
item.description:
@Acorn1 wrote:

[quote=“Uncalled, post:26, topic:435460”][quote author=Acorn_ link=topic=538180.msg3937225#msg3937225 date=1331138726]
That’s a misconception, marijuana does not destroy braincells however lack of oxygen while holding smoke in does.
I never hold a hit in for more then 5 seconds, after then most of the thc has been absorbed anyways and everything after that is just tar.
[/quote]Actually, it does kill brain cells. But you know what else does? Shaking your head, most showers [unless you have it at a perfect temperature], sleeping [if you roll around], having sex, masturbation, holding your breath, getting angry, sneezing, laughing too hard, coughing too hard, getting punched, basically everything does.[/quote]
Not directly the cannabis itself but smoking it does.
And yea, I’ve never really used grinders before however I’ve heard they really speed things up and I like my bud really grinded up and I’m not about to waste my money I could be buying more bud with on a piece of crap.

Also, skyru it’ll be legal soon enough first they’ll make it medical strictly in every state though.
The only reason it actually isn’t legal is because they can’t tax it at the moment which is just a bogus reason…

Read full topic

item.title: eBay Calling me?
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

[quote=“Acorn_, post:23, topic:435460”][quote author=Kidpaparoach link=topic=538180.msg3937827#msg3937827 date=1331170529]
I bought a few grinders of ebay, there all shit. the don’t grind smoothly and are rough when you turn them. Just go to a shop and get a 9piece for like a fiver. Smooth grinders + usually they have crystal catchers and last until you loose them tbh.
But just lie to eBay w.e., there not gonna be like send us this or that…
[/quote]
It has a crystal catcher and I examined it closely to make sure the blades weren’t dull and they look pretty good to me, guess I’ll know in a day or too when it gets here.
I’m just pumped for Friday when I go out with my buddies and there busy braking up there bud still and I’m already rollin up hahah.[/quote]
Ah, good to know your making sure your only getting the best quality kit. A good grinder really does make a difference;p. Only thing I’d say is a fair bit of the time pictures on eBay aren’t of the object when it comes to items like these but you sound like you checked it thoroughly(like there feedbacks etc) so you’ll be fine probably. Haha nice one ;p, I think I’ll get a gramme on friday too actually, after a quiet j to myself bedtime j then save a jay for the house party i’m going to on Saturday which will be fine cause I’m getting a few cans and a half bottle for that aswell.

Read full topic
